title: pes fees through pessat
content: what's the fee's for cse and cse with spec through pessat?

comments.body: For the previous batch it was 4.1 LPA for CSE and AIML courses, I guess it might be changed for the present batch.

4.5L tuition,  around 5L including hostel ,
Fees is a LOT.

No 4.5L is tution and 1.38 or 1.6 is hostel fees+caution deposit 
For us 2022 batch ours was 4.1 tution and 1.3 hostel including caution deposit

oh so even more than 5 lakhs? ðŸ™‚ðŸ™‚ðŸ™‚

btw what's the difference between 1.38 and 1.6 rooms?

Common and attached bathroom btw 
1.38 is with caution deposit common bathroom 
1.52 is with attached bathroom with deposit


Also please refer the new fees structure as I got to know somewhere they have increased the fees

Thanks, hostels are double sharing?
on the site it just said 4.5/annum, nothing else I could see mentioned
Whatever the fees be, it's not worth it.
